abstract: General Motors could have more difficulty keeping pace with Toyota this year as record crude oil prices and gas prices near $4 a gallon dampen demand in the United States.
snippet: General Motors could have more difficulty keeping pace with Toyota this year as record crude oil prices and gas prices near $4 a gallon dampen demand in the United States.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  The General Motors Corporation said on Wednesday that the slowdown in the United States market had led to a decline in sales in the first quarter and had allowed Toyota to take the lead in this year’s global sales race.

headline.main: G.M. Trails Toyota as U.S. Sales Slow
headline.print_headline: G.M. Slips Behind Toyota as U.S. Sales Lag
